alert.note: Alert for Kimble (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 16 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kimble County through 1030 PM CDT... At 957 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cleo, or near Junction, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Junction, Segovia, South Llano River State Park, Yates Crossing and Cleo. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 445 and 471. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
